workflow.title: Author Citation Network
workflow.description: Map citation/reference network for one author using Europe PMC Web services. This workflow was created during the Tavernathon exercise held at the LUMC on October 14, 2015 and is intended to show the integration of several Web services, XPath XML parsing and use of the igraph package in R. Although the workflow is functional, the information in PubMed is incomplete, resulting in the workflow producing a subset of the correct citation graph.
